short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lets you know if your page actually refreshed

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sometimes live updating web applications in development can update without you even realizing.  This plugin adds a random emoji to a localhost's page title every time the page is refreshed, to let you now for sure that a page actually refreshed.
